document.full_text: the barcelona great once again showed how he is in a class of his own in his team's 3-1 victory tuesday, which sent it to the next round of the champions league soccer tournament.
document.title: on soccer: no messi means no chance for arsenal
lines_and_colors: the barcelona great once again showed how he is in a class of his own in his team's 3-1 victory tuesday, which sent it to the next round of the champions league soccer tournament.
